sense.name: what a sign signifies, the abstract role of what is signified
sense.commentary: MEANING[+relation][+role][+referent][+of_sign] Note: refers to specific referents of linguistic symbols and signs.
sense.examples: What is the meaning of this Chinese character? Language is an assignment of conventional meaning to arbitrary symbols. The meaning of many words has changed over time.

sense.name: the intended message, substance, content
sense.commentary: MEANING[+entity][+abstract][+information][+message][+intended] Note: refers to propositional content, extended ideas Note: implies an some agent intentionally striving to communicate something
sense.examples: The guru taught his pupils the meaning of life. Sally doesn't understand the meaning of modern art. She gave me a look full of meaning. What is the meaning of leaving this mess in my kitchen!

sense.name: the quality of being very important
sense.examples: Winning the championship had great meaning for the whole nation. The history of their family had little meaning for the two teenagers. These activities can lead to new meaning in the life of elderly people.
